title: eLysium eSports Now Taking Player Applications!
body:
Good Evening,

We have narrowed down our coaches to a top 3 and a selection will be made from there via a skype interview.
Amongst the potential coaches are a Master Tier EUNE player with vast coaching experience, coaching the likes of Paleo Gaming in the NA scene.
The others are both local Master Tier players with great LAN experience, both coaching and participating. Obviously at first glance people are wondering
how a start up team persuaded them. There were _**incentives**_ provided.  Found out what these are through applying, we have great backing!

Help us and yourself grow through these magnificent role models and apply today! 

eLysium eSports.
elysiumesportsoce@gmail.com

elysiumesports.net
